quiz.text: With respect to recently (August 2023) convened 5th regional meeting of the International Solar Alliance (ISA) which of the following statement is/are incorrect?
options: It was held in Kigali, Rwanda.
The report “Roadmap of Solar Energy for Universal Energy Access”, released by ISA during the meeting.
The ISA felicitated the winners of its SolarX StartUp Challenge, initiative aimed to promote entrepreneurship and advance clean energy among all the ISA Member Countries.
Solar power demonstration projects in Uganda, Comoros and Mali financed through ISA inaugurated during the meeting.
None of the above.

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is/are correct with respect to Tele-Law 2.0 initiative seen in the news recently (August 2023)?A) It is launched under the e-Courts Project.B) Its objective is to integrate legal advice service under Nyaya Bandhu (Pro Bono) programme Tele-Law with legal representation services under Tele-Law. C) It fulfils the Constitutional mandate of Article 39 A to ensure access to justice for all.
options: A and B only
A and C only
B and C only
B only
C only

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is/are incorrect with respect to eCourts Project initiative seen in the news recently (August 2023)?
options: eCourts Project was launched by the Supreme Court of India in 2007.
eCourts Project is being Implemented by the e-Committee Supreme Court of India and the Department of Justice.
National Judicial Data Grid Database under this project works as a monitoring tool to identify, manage and reduce pendency of cases.
Case Information System Software under this project Developed by National Informatics Centre (NIC), Pune.
Under this project 22 Virtual Courts have also been operationalized to handle traffic challan cases in speedy manner.

quiz.text: Which of the following statement is/are correct with respect to G20 Trade and Investment Ministers’ Meeting seen in the news recently (August 2023)?A) Venue of the meeting was Jaipur in Rajasthan.B) Adopted 10 High-Level Principles on Digitalization of Trade Documents to provide guidance to the countries about dimensions of an effective transition to paperless trade. C) Issued a Jaipur Call for Action for enhancing access to information for MSMEs.D) Endorsed a G20 Generic Mapping Framework for Global Value Chains (GVCs).
options: A, B, C only
A, C, D only
B, C, D only
B and D only
All of the above

quiz.text: With respect to recently (August 2023) held G20 side events, identify the incorrect one-
options: 4thG20 Culture Working Group (CWG) Meeting was held at Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh.
G20 Culture Ministers’ Meeting was held at Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh.
G20 Culture Ministers’ Meeting unanimously adopted the Outcome Document- “Kashi Culture Pathway”.
G20 Orchestra-‘ Waves of Music’ was organized by the Culture Working Group to celebrate the rich musical knowledge and heritage of G20 member nations and guest countries.
None of the above

quiz.text: Prime Minister’s Principal Secretary recently (August 2023) chaired the ninth meeting of the G20 coordination committee. During the meeting for the first time, a mobile App exclusively made for G20, called ‘_______’ made available for download.
options: G20@India
G20@Bharat
G20Kutumb
G20Family
G20 India

quiz.text: Renewable Energy Technology Action Platform (RETAP) under the Strategic Clean Energy Partnership seen in the news recently (August 2023) is the result of the collaboration between-
options: The United Nations Environment Programme and Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE), Government of India
The International Renewable Energy Agency and Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE), Government of India
The United Nations Environment Programme and American Council on Renewable Energy
The Association for Renewable Energy and Clean Technology and US Department of Energy (DOE)
US Department of Energy (DOE) and Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE), Government of India

quiz.text: Union Minister of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying recently (August 2023) started the Sagar Parikrama Phase VIII to understand the on-ground challenges and problems of the fishers. It started from _______ and thereafter it will proceed across the coastal regions of _______.
options: Vizhinjam, Kerala & Karnataka
Vizhinjam, Tamil Nadu & Andhra Pradesh
Muthalapozhy Fishing Harbour, Andhra Pradesh & Tamil Nadu
Muthalapozhy Fishing Harbour, Tamil Nadu & Andhra Pradesh
Vizhinjam, Kerala & Tamil Nadu

quiz.text: The National Statistical Office (NSO) recently released (August 2023) press note on estimates of GDP for the April-June quarter (Q1) of 2023-24. While Real GDP is showing growth of______ as compared to 13.1% in 2022-23. Nominal GDP is showing a growth of _______ as compared to 27.7% in Q1 2022-23.
options: 8.0%, 7.2%
8.0%, 7.5%
7.8%, 8.0%
7.5 %, 8.0%
None of the above

quiz.text: Swachh Vayu Sarvekshan-2023 conducted by the Central Pollution Control Board (CPCB) released recently (August 2023). Identify the correct statements with respect to it-A) In the category of cities with populations exceeding 10 lakhs Indore secured the 1stposition and Bhopal secured the 5thrank.B) Swachh Vayu Sarvekshan launched under National Clean Air Programme (NCAP) in January, 2019.C) Under Swachh Vayu Sarvekshan Cities are required to do the self-assessment annually as per the framework provided on VAYU online portal.
options: A only
B only
C only
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023) the _______ and Fourth Partner Energy Private Limited (Fourth Partner) signed a long-term loan deal to build solar power unit in _______.
options: The Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB), Gujarat
Asian Development Bank (ADB), Tamil Nadu
World Bank, Rajasthan
The Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB), Tamil Nadu
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently representatives from 48 African countries were gathered for the Conference of States on the continental expansion of the Kampala Ministerial Declaration. This declaration deals with which of the following issue?
options: War induced illegal migration through Mediterranean Sea
War crimes committed by the state actors
Illegal and overt attempts of coup to overthrow civilian governments
Migration, Environment and Climate Change
All of the above

quiz.text: The 7th assembly of the ________ was held to critically evaluate 2030 goals to end pollution and nature loss, combat climate change, and propel inclusive, locally-led conservation. Global Biodiversity Framework Fund launched during the assembly as a new source of funding for protecting species and ecosystems globally. Venue for this assembly was ______.
options: Global Conservation Facility & New Delhi
Global Environment Facility & Vancouver
World Wide Fund for Nature & Davos
The United Nations Environment Programme & Nairobi
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023) 2nd edition of the 'Namaste Vietnam Festival 2023' between India and Vietnam concluded. MOU's worth more than USD 1 billion were signed in three major sectors. Which of the following sector is not one of them?
options: Railways
Tourism
Cinema
Science
None of the above

quiz.text: The UN Child Rights Committee recently (August 2023) published authoritative guidance on children’s rights with a special focus on _______.This guidance is formally known as General Comment No_______.
options: Universal Basic Nutrition & 62
Primary Education & 42
Climate Change & 26
Sexual Exploitation & 40
Digital Literacy & 21

quiz.text: Union Home Minister recently chaired the 26th Meeting of the Western Zonal Council at Gandhinagar, Gujarat. Identify incorrect statement with respect to Zonal council.
options: Web portal https://iscs-eresource.gov.in is digital Repository of the documents like minutes and agenda of the various meetings of the Zonal Councils & their Standing Committee.
Five Zonal Councils were established by States Reorganization Act of 1956.
Vice Chairman of the Zonal Councils gets two year term at a time.
The secretarial functions of the Zonal Councils have been transferred to the Inter-State Council Secretariat with effect from 1st April, 2011.
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), Ministry of Education’s Innovation Cell & the All-India Council of Technical Education (AICTE) has launched Smart India Hackathon (SIH) 2023. Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct with regard to SIH 2023a) The event comprises of 16 Themesb) 239 problem statements have been identified under the initiativec) 26 Central Ministries, 6 State Ministries, and 4 Industry partners are involved in the initiative
options: only a
only b
both a and b
both a and c
All three statements are correct

quiz.text: The Government of India is setting up climate change and health hub in New Delhi in partnership with which of the following organizations?
options: United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP)
Asian Development Bank (ADB)
World Health Organization (WHO)
New Development Bank (NDB)
Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB)

quiz.text: Which of the following agencies/ ministries is the nodal Institution for coordinating the adoption and monitoring of SDGs at the national and sub-national levels
options: Ministry of Earth Sciences
Ministry of Environment, Forest & Climate Change
Ministry of New & Renewable Energy
NITI Aayog
National Green Tribunal

quiz.text: Match the followinga) SDG-2   1. Clean Water and Sanitationb) SDG-6   2. Life on Landc) SDG-15  3. Zero Hunger
options: a-1, b-2, c-3
a-3, b-1, c-2
a-3, b-2, c-1
a-2, b-1, c-3
a-2, b-3, c-1

quiz.text: According to recent data released by the Ministry of Ministry of Social Justice & Empowerment, how many districts across India have declared themselves as manual scavenging-free?
options: 590
420
520
480
580

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), which of the following firms have launched India’s first ONDC focused venture platform?
options: Sequoia Capital
Ventureast
Antler India
Kae Capital
Omidyar Network India

options: 2023
2022
2021
2019

quiz.text: Which of the following statement(s) is/are correct regarding ONDC?a) It is the world’s first initiative to democratize digital commerceb) The founding members of ONDC are Quality Council of India and Protean eGov Technologies Limited.c) It was pilot launched in 10 cities in 2022.
options: only a
only b
only c
both a and b

quiz.text: Recently (August 2023), which of the following organizations have launched She Leads Bharat:Udyam initiative in association with Mastercard Center and Frontier Markets?
